jd:
We’re looking for a talented Frontend Engineer who is versatile, displays leadership qualities, and is keen to take on new challenges. As part of the Clika team, you will get to implement and design a Deep Learning platform where you will have an impact on how customers interact with Clika products. You will also gain knowledge and industrial proficiency in how to manage, view and control Deep Learning models in production.


Responsibilities
• Write clean, concise, modular code that is easily testable 

• Participate in an agile environment.

• Participate in the full software development lifecycle (requirements gathering, designing, building, testing and maintenance). 

• Participate in code reviews.

Basic Qualifications
• B.Sc Computer Science or equivalent degree/experience 

• Strong team player with excellent communication skills in verbal and written English 

• Experience in Typescript  

• Experience working with Git 

• Experience developing in React 

• Experience in working with Cloud Environment 

• Experience in Unit Testing

Preferred Qualifications
• M.Sc Computer Science or equivalent degree/experience 

• Experience developing in Next.js 

• Experience in working with AWS Cloud Environment 

• Experience in SaaS Web App Development 

• Experience in CI/CD and Auto Testing 

• Experience working with Linux

Company Benefits
• We are a startup founded by Top MLOps expert from world’s leading autonomous driving solution company. We dig deeply into MLOps, because we will make AI & ML development easy and convenient. 

• We are an international English-speaking company where everyone can express their opinion and thoughts. We encourage self-growth and respect off-work time. 

• You will have the chance to learn from and work with a former top engineer at a worldwide leading Autonomous Driving Solution company.



[Interview Process] 

•45 minutes offline/online interview 

•Technical assessment 

•45 minutes offline/online where we talk about the assessment 

•Decision


Make sure you:

• Attach CV in English as PDF format.

• Include anything that you think will help us know you better. (e.g., website, blog, GitHub, short letter, etc.)
